name: Infectious Flatmates
description:
INFECTIOUS FLATMATES

An infection arrived to your flat, you are the only healthy flatmate which means you have to cook for all of them, but if they need to go to the bathroom or shower, you should maintain the safe distance. Good luck with those Infectious Flatmates!

How To Play:

Take frozen food (right side) and cook it in the stoves (left side) and leave it in your flatmates door (top side). They will only reward you if you bring the correct dish.

Try to not be infected by your flatmates while they go to the shower or to the bathroom (bottom side).

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows - move
  • Space or Intro - take/drop
  • R - Restart

Music:

Eric Skiff - Resistor Anthems - http://ericskiff.com/music/
